column4: Hey, I have a problem, I am trying to install wine, but it says the package "libarsc0" isn't installed. How can I get ahold of it? I have tried synaptic.
Not available. The package haven't got an installation candidate
I have a 64-bit processor and use 32-bit ubuntu for these very reasons
it's not as hard as it seems, and infact quite useful knowledge to know how to chroot
I think so :) Where to check?
So, I need to install drivers?
you can only have one package manager open at once
generic video card don't sound right lol
if you want, but xorg.conf is tricky
